Продажа криптовалюты в сервисе Antares P: Selling cryptocurrency in the Antares P2P service:
1. Register with Antares P2P.
2. Fill one of your crypto wallets
in your Antares P2P personal account to start the exchange.
3. Then go to the home page and create a cryptocurrency exchange ad.
4. Then wait until there is a buyer for your ad. Remember, in order to find a buyer more quickly, you need to make sure your offer is a good one on the market!
Покупка криптовалюты в сервисе Antares P: Buying cryptocurrency from the Antares P2P service:
1.\tЕсли вам необходимо приобрести крипт:
1. If you need to buy cryptocurrency, you can do so for fiat simply by searching for a suitable offer on the homepage.
2. When an advertisement is found, click on the "Buy" button next to it.
3. Read the terms of the deal carefully. If necessary, clarify all details in the Antares P2P chat with the seller.
4. Then click "Buy'" again and transfer the money to the details given to you by the seller in the Antares P2P chat.
5. Then click "I paid". The seller will verify the payment and send you the cryptocurrency.
6. The cryptocurrency will arrive in your Antares P2P wallet.
Как работает система Escrow и Social Tru: How does Escrow and Social Trust Scoring work in Antares P2P?
Все сделки в Antares P2P защищены систем:
All Antares P2P transactions are protected by ESCROW and Social Trust Scoring.

A seller creates an announcement to sell the cryptocurrency.
When an announcement is created with a seller, the cryptocurrency is temporarily frozen by ESCROW and Social Trust Scoring for the amount of the announcement creation. A buyer with fiat money then comes to the announcement and creates an order that he wants to buy cryptocurrency from the seller.
Покупатель жмет на кнопку “Я оплатил” к:
The buyer presses the "I paid" button when the money has been transferred. The seller then checks that payment has been received from the buyer and clicks "Payment received".  The seller's cryptocurrency withheld by ESCROW and Social Trust Scoring is then automatically transferred to the buyer in the transaction.

The seller is charged a fee when transferring the cryptocurrency in the transaction
according to the formula:
the amount of cryptocurrency on the order + % commission of the service.

Read more about commissions here.
Всего 3 типа комиссий в Antares P2P:\n: There are a total of 3 types of commissions in Antares P2P:
1. Комиссия за ввод\n2. Комиссия за выво:
1. Commission for entry
2. Withdrawal fee
3. P2P exchange fee
Комиссия за ввод в Antares P2P:\nКомисси:
Entry fee in Antares P2P:
Deposit fee = 0%.

Withdrawal fee from Antares P2P:
BTC: 1% + network fee
USDT (ERC 20): 1% + ETH network fee
LTC: 1% + LTC network commission
ETH: 1% + ETH network fee
AND: 1%
